strapiPost.title: Mercy Adding 32 New Physicians And Health Care Providers
strapiPost.content:
Mercy NWA just upped its healthcare game by adding some heavy hitters to its team, expanding its capabilities and giving patients in NWA even more access to top-notch care.

  • 32 hires: These new providers come from a variety of specialties, including primary care, pediatrics, and OB/GYN. This addition inches the hospital closer to its 100 new headcount goal which is nearly double from two years ago.
  • Why it matters: With these new additions, patients can expect shorter wait times, more specialized care options, and the luxury of knowing they're being treated by experienced professionals.

Learn more about Mercy's vision for NWA and expected upgrades HERE.
